css: * { margin: 0; padding: 0; box-sizing: border-box; } body { font-family: 'Helvetica', 'Arial', sans-serif; font-size: 10.5px; line-height: 1.4; padding: 12mm 15mm; color: #000000; } h1 { font-size: 22px; font-weight: bold; color: #000000; margin-bottom: 8px; padding-bottom: 6px; border-bottom: 2.5px solid #000000; } h2 { font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; color: #000000; margin-top: 14px; margin-bottom: 6px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 0.5px; border-bottom: 1.5px solid #000000; padding-bottom: 3px; } h3 { font-size: 11.5px; font-weight: bold; color: #000000; margin-top: 10px; margin-bottom: 3px; } h4 { font-size: 10px; font-weight: 600; color: #000000; margin-bottom: 2px; } p { margin-bottom: 6px; line-height: 1.35; color: #000000; } ul { padding-left: 16px; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #000000; } li { margin-bottom: 3px; line-height: 1.35; color: #000000; } strong { font-weight: 600; color: #000000; } a { color: #000000; text-decoration: none; } hr { border: none; border-top: 1px solid #000000; margin: 12px 0; } @page { size: A4; margin: 0; }
